title: UNITEK Ultra-Mini 4 Port USB 3.0 Hub Compact SuperSpeed for Ultra Book, MacBook Air, Windows 8 Tablet PC
description: Unitek super mini 4 ports usb 3 hubWant add up to 4 peripherals usb 3 easily to your PC ou tablet?Unitek ultra compact hub usb 3 will be a great travel companion for you, especially for those who use the notebooks with only a few ports. You can connect with a lot of devices at one time thanks to this hub bus powered.Features:- Peripherals: 4 PORTS USB 3.0- USB 3.0: Transfer speed: 5GB (USB3.0/HS), 480Mbps (USB2.0/HS), 12Mbps (USB1.1/FS)- Systems required: Windows: 2000/XP/Vista/7/8 (Both 32-bit & 64-bit versions)  MAC: OS X and AbovePlease Note:2.4Ghz wireless devices, such as wireless keyboard and mouse adapters, may not work in close proximity to USB 3.0 devices or hubs. Connecting to a USB 2.0 port is recommended.For a stable connection, the devices connected to the 4-Port USB 3.0 Hub must not exceed a combined current of 5 volts 900 mAh. External hard-drives should be connected to an external power source.Package:* 4-port USB 3.0 hub.
